metadata.title: CVE-2023-3111 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free vulnerability was found in prepare_to_relocate infs/btrfs/relocation.c in btrfs in the Linux Kernel. This possible flaw canbe triggered by calling btrfs_ioctl_balance() before callingbtrfs_ioctl_defrag().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
